name: rewarm
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something or someone warm again, or to become warm again: Patients who are rewarmed slowly after surgery tend to do better on cognitive tests. While the stew is re-warming, add the liquid while stirring constantly.
More examplesFewer examplesLeftovers can be refrigerated and rewarmed as needed. A person who is suffering from hypothermia must be rewarmed gradually, essentially from the inside out.The terminal offloads cargoes of natural gas that have been condensed into liquid for shipment and rewarms them into gas.
